title: Minor Deviation - Equipment Issue - Paracetamol
description: Valve positioning error during automated sequence operation

resolution.action_taken: Deviation investigated per SOP-DEV-001. Root cause analysis completed identifying: Actuator position feedback sensor drift. Corrective actions implemented as per linked CAPA. CAPA completed successfully with preventive measures in place.

description: Agitator speed variation beyond acceptable limits during mixing

resolution.action_taken: Deviation investigated per SOP-DEV-001. Root cause analysis completed identifying: Motor drive controller malfunction. Corrective actions implemented as per linked CAPA. CAPA completed successfully with preventive measures in place.
